testName: building basic select query for job-requirement-type

expected.query:
select id, requirement_type, requirement_description
    from job_requirement_type

testName: building select query for job-requirement-type with WHERE clause

expected.query:
select id, requirement_type
    from job_requirement_type
    
    where job_requirement_type.requirement_type = $1

testName: building select query for job-requirement-type with WHERE and ORDER BY

expected.query:
select id, requirement_type, requirement_description
    from job_requirement_type
    
    where job_requirement_type.id > $1
    
    order by job_requirement_type.requirement_type asc

testName: building select query for job-requirement-type with LIMIT

expected.query:
select id, requirement_type
    from job_requirement_type
    
    
    
    
    limit 10
